Container.Name: cleanuperr
Container.Overview:
## cleanuperr
cleanuperr is a tool for automating the cleanup of unwanted or blocked files in Sonarr, Radarr, and supported download clients like qBittorrent. It removes incomplete or blocked downloads, updates queues, and enforces blacklists or whitelists to manage file selection. After removing blocked content, cleanuperr can also trigger a search to replace the deleted shows/movies. For a detailed guide on how to use it, check out the project's GitHub page.

Config.Name: LOGGING__LOGLEVEL
Config.Description: Can be Verbose, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, or Fatal

Config.Name: LOGGING__FILE__ENABLED
Config.Description: Enable or disable logging to file

Config.Name: LOGGING__FILE__PATH
Config.Description: Directory where to save the log files

Config.Name: LOGGING__ENHANCED
Config.Description: Enhance logs whenever possible

Config.Name: TRIGGERS__QUEUECLEANER
Config.Description: Required if queue cleaner is enabled - Quartz cron trigger. Can be a max of 1h interval.

Config.Name: TRIGGERS__CONTENTBLOCKER
Config.Description: Required if content blocker is enabled - Quartz cron trigger. Can be a max of 1h interval.

Config.Name: QUEUECLEANER__ENABLED
Config.Description: Enable or disable the queue cleaner

Config.Name: QUEUECLEANER__RUNSEQUENTIALLY
Config.Description: Run queue cleaner after content blocker instead of parallel execution

Config.Name: QUEUECLEANER__IMPORT_FAILED_MAX_STRIKES
Config.Description: Number of strikes before removing failed imports (0 means never)

Config.Name: QUEUECLEANER__IMPORT_FAILED_IGNORE_PRIVATE
Config.Description: Whether to ignore failed imports from private trackers

Config.Name: QUEUECLEANER__IMPORT_FAILED_IGNORE_PATTERNS__0
Config.Description: First pattern to look for when an import is failed. If the specified message pattern is found, the item is skipped.

Config.Name: QUEUECLEANER__STALLED_MAX_STRIKES
Config.Description: Number of strikes before removing stalled downloads (0 means never)

Config.Name: QUEUECLEANER__STALLED_IGNORE_PRIVATE
Config.Description: Whether to ignore stalled downloads from private trackers

Config.Name: CONTENTBLOCKER__ENABLED
Config.Description: Enable or disable the content blocker

Config.Name: CONTENTBLOCKER__IGNORE_PRIVATE
Config.Description: Whether to ignore downloads from private trackers

Config.Name: CONTENTBLOCKER__BLACKLIST__ENABLED
Config.Description: Enable or disable the blacklist

Config.Name: CONTENTBLOCKER__BLACKLIST__PATH
Config.Description: Path to the blacklist (local file or URL). Needs to be JSON compatible.

Config.Name: CONTENTBLOCKER__WHITELIST__ENABLED
Config.Description: Enable or disable the whitelist

Config.Name: CONTENTBLOCKER__WHITELIST__PATH
Config.Description: Path to the whitelist (local file or URL). Needs to be JSON compatible.

Config.Name: DOWNLOAD_CLIENT
Config.Description: Download client used by *arrs. Can be qbittorrent, deluge, or transmission

Config.Name: QBITTORRENT__URL
Config.Description: qBittorrent instance URL

Config.Name: QBITTORRENT__USERNAME
Config.Description: qBittorrent username

Config.Name: QBITTORRENT__PASSWORD
Config.Description: qBittorrent password

Config.Name: DELUGE__URL
Config.Description: Deluge instance URL

Config.Name: DELUGE__PASSWORD
Config.Description: Deluge password

Config.Name: TRANSMISSION__URL
Config.Description: Transmission instance URL

Config.Name: TRANSMISSION__USERNAME
Config.Description: Transmission username

Config.Name: TRANSMISSION__PASSWORD
Config.Description: Transmission password

Config.Name: SONARR__ENABLED
Config.Description: Enable or disable Sonarr cleanup

Config.Name: SONARR__SEARCHTYPE
Config.Description: What to search for after removing a queue item

Config.Name: SONARR__INSTANCES__0__URL
Config.Description: First Sonarr instance url

Config.Name: SONARR__INSTANCES__0__APIKEY
Config.Description: First Sonarr instance API key

Config.Name: RADARR__ENABLED
Config.Description: Whether Radarr cleanup is enabled or not

Config.Name: RADARR__INSTANCES__0__URL
Config.Description: First Radarr instance url

Config.Name: RADARR__INSTANCES__0__APIKEY
Config.Description: First Radarr instance API key

Config.Name: HTTP_MAX_RETRIES
Config.Description: The number of times to retry a failed HTTP call (to *arrs, download clients etc.)

Config.Name: HTTP_TIMEOUT
Config.Description: The number of seconds to wait before failing an HTTP call (to *arrs, download clients etc.)
